item.title: MentorCity
item.description:
MentorCity

MentorCity offers comprehensive, easy-to-use and cost-effective mentoring software for business, non-profits and educational institutions.

item.title: How The Economic Machine Works by Ray Dalio
item.description:
How The Economic Machine Works by Ray Dalio

Economics 101 -- "How the Economic Machine Works." Created by Ray Dalio this simple but not simplistic and easy to follow 30 minute, animated video answers the question, "How does the economy really work?"

item.title: 8 Ways a Mentor Will Help You Find Career Success
item.description:
8 Ways a Mentor Will Help You Find Career Success

Success Tweet: Find a mentor. Mentors are positive people who will help you find the lessons in your experience and use them to move forward. This is a long post, because mentors are an important source of career advice. The term "mentor" comes from The Odyssey.

item.title: 10 Brilliant Ways to Live Like You're Rich, Even on a Small Budget
item.description:
10 Brilliant Ways to Live Like You're Rich, Even on a Small Budget

You might think you don't make enough money to buy fancy cars and clothes, or to take a cruise or even go to the symphony. But it's possible to do all of these things and more without spending a ton of cash. Here's how to feel rich, even if you're not.

item.title: Here's what it was like to be Mansa Musa, thought to be the richest person in history
item.description:
Here's what it was like to be Mansa Musa, thought to be the richest person in history

African King Musa Keita I is thought to be the richest person of all time - "richer than anyone could describe," reports Time. Literally. His fortune was incomprehensible, Time's Jacob Davidson writes: "There's really no way to put an accurate number on his wealth."

item.title: 16 Rich Habits
item.description:
16 Rich Habits

Intelligence, talent and charm are great, but more often than not these aren't what separate the wealthiest among us from the poorest. Instead, the differences are in our daily habits. Do you realize that these subconscious, second-nature activities make up 40 percent of our waking hours?

item.title: The 10 most expensive cars in the world
item.description:
The 10 most expensive cars in the world

April 6, 2016 In life, you get what you pay for. And for some very wealthy gearheads, forking over the big bucks means getting ludicrous amounts of speed, industry-leading technology and a whole lot of prestige. Hit the track in any one of these supercars and you'll quickly understand why these vehicles cost as much as they do.

item.title: 20 Most Expensive Houses In The World
item.description:
20 Most Expensive Houses In The World

Have you ever wondered what the finest and most expensive houses could look like? Then here, with combined information from Forbes, we bring you images of the world's most expensive homes, designed by professional and talented

item.title: Don't Gamble On Binary Options
item.description:
Don't Gamble On Binary Options

New Internet fad purports to offer a low-risk way to make money fast. Don't be fooled. You might as well play roulette.

item.title: "FERI IS " - FERI Designer Lines at the Emmy Awards, (2013)

"FERI IS " - FERI Designer Lines at the Emmy Awards, (2013)

FERI at the Emmys
